title: Relates to the crime of unauthorized use of a motor vehicle
summary: Relates to the crime of unauthorized use of a motor vehicle; adds other motor vehicle related crimes as predicate crimes which may increase punishment for unauthorized use of a motor vehicle in the second degree when one is convicted of such crimes within the preceding ten years.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1042

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by Sens. KLEIN, DIAZ, HUNTLEY, PARKER, SAMPSON, SMITH, STAVI-
         SKY  -- read twice and ordered printed, and when printed to be commit-
         ted to the Committee on Codes

       AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to the crime of  unauthorized
         use of a motor vehicle in the second degree

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 165.06 of the penal law, as amended by chapter  413
    2  of the laws of 1982, is amended to read as follows:
    3  S 165.06 Unauthorized use of a vehicle in the second degree.
    4    A  person  is  guilty  of  unauthorized use of a vehicle in the second
    5  degree when:
    6    He OR SHE commits the crime of unauthorized use of a  vehicle  in  the
    7  third  degree  as  defined  in subdivision one of section 165.05 of this
    8  article and has been previously convicted of the crime  of  unauthorized
    9  use of a vehicle [in the third degree] as defined in [subdivision one of
   10  section  165.05  or  second degree] SECTIONS 165.05, 165.06, AND 165.08,
   11  AUTO STRIPPING AS DEFINED IN SECTIONS 165.09, 165.10, AND 165.11,  GRAND
   12  LARCENY  OF  A  MOTOR  VEHICLE  AS  DEFINED  IN SECTIONS 155.30, 155.35,
   13  155.40, AND 155.42, CRIMINAL POSSESSION OF STOLEN PROPERTY AS DEFINED IN
   14  SECTIONS 165.40, 165.45, 165.50, 165.52,   AND  165.54  AND  THE  STOLEN
   15  PROPERTY  CONSISTED OF A MOTOR VEHICLE, OR ILLEGAL POSSESSION OF A VEHI-
   16  CLE IDENTIFICATION NUMBER  AS  DEFINED  IN  SECTION  170.70  within  the
   17  preceding ten years.
   18    Unauthorized  use of a vehicle in the second degree is a class E felo-
   19  ny.
   20    S 2. This act shall take effect on the ninetieth day  after  it  shall
   21  have become a law.

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD04358-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to the crime of unauthorized use of a motor vehicle in the second degree
